column5: Light-filled urban retreat within easy walking/biking distance to Austin's hot spots. Walk or ride to ACL! Charming downtown neighborhood with restaurants, bars, coffee shops, grocery store. Renovated kitchen with granite countertops, marble backsplash and stainless steel appliances. Two large bedrooms and one bath. Swim at Barton Springs, bike/kayak Ladybird Lake, eat some fantastic Austin fare, then come home and relax on the front porch.  2 FREE Bikes included with rental!
column8: Downtown Bungalow + FREE Bikes! Walk to ACL!
